Jetbrains responds to my blog with great news!

Posted by raymondlewallen on February 9, 2005

Earlier this week, I blogged about how I wanted to be able to subscribe to single blog posts so I can be emailed when someone comments.
Well, great news has found its way to me via Michael Gerasimov,
JetBrains Omea Developer. He says, and you can see this is the comments
of that post,

“Dear Raymond,
You requests will be available in the next version of the Omea (both
Reader and Pro) which will be available in few (4-6) weeks.”

Now if you’re me, this is great news, because they addressed, obviously
before I commented on it, a very big issue I have with the blogoshere
and tools out there for the blogging world.

Thank you Jetbrains!

Currently listening to: 3 Sheets to the Wind – Kid Rock
